Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI, while less reliable, is available to me at all times. Flexibilty is necessary as I am not always able to work on my assignments around a teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback felt much more personal and allowed me to absorb the content better.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback was relevant to the marking scheme.
